Reviews.Title: Great Rugged Phone
Reviews.Author: Steve L
Reviews.Content: Great phone, very strong, fast and always reliable. Ideal for heavy users and kids, Good features and easy to use

Reviews.Title: Never buy a used cell phone
Reviews.Author: Gene B.
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend owns this phone, and I love hers. So I ordered this one for myself. Problem was, it came with problems. Blue tooth didn;t work. Phone would alwyas switch over to speaker when answering it. And the person who sold it, left all thier contacts, pictures, and videos on it.. So what I bought, was another persons phone who had problems. No wonder why they sold it. I will never but another person phone over the internet.

Reviews.Title: Shipping takes to long
Reviews.Author: Reaper
Reviews.Content: i ordered my parcel on Saturday the 14th and i selected the 1-3 day shipping and its understandable that its the weekend and USPS doesn't deliver on weekends, but 1-3 days would mean id get it Wednesday or Thursday and yet its still in NY. I ordered another item with standard shipping and will be receiving it tomorrow. So if your not in a rush to get your phones then i suggest the standard free shipping.

ProductInfo.Name: Huawei Pinnacle 2 QWERTY CDMA Cell Phone Black Metro PCS
